Package com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis.model.playablechar

Interface LuisCombat

All Known Implementing Classes:
Luis
public interface LuisCombat
This interface implements different methods for the Luis combat system in the game. Different types of attacks are implemented for the character use, and attacks that can be received.
Author:
Christian Jesus Parra Cofre
See Also:
Enemies
